distribution_strategy: The document is divided logically by section. SM-001 handles the introductory sections, SM-002 focuses on the core methodology and results, and SM-003 handles the conclusion and overall synthesis. This allows for specialized processing based on the content of each section.

submasters.role: Summarize Abstract and Introduction sections for overview
Extract key methods and results from the Body section. Focus on identifying experimental setups, datasets used, and quantitative results.
Synthesize the Conclusion section and identify the key findings of the paper. Compare these findings with the results extracted by SM-002 to ensure consistency.
